title: Elegant Studio Retreat near Sopot’s Cultural Heart
description: Step into refined comfort in this impeccably designed studio in Kamienny Potok, sized at 35 sqm. Featuring a contemporary open layout that maximizes light and space, the apartment offers a cozy fireplace for ambient evenings and a generous walk-in closet. The luxury bathroom includes premium finishes, while a subtle rainwater collection system reflects both comfort and sustainability.
neighborhood_description: Nestled in Kamienny Potok, you’re minutes from Sopot’s vibrant cultural scene, trendy cafes, and acclaimed restaurants. This dynamic area blends upscale surroundings with tranquil green spaces and easy access to local amenities. Proximity to excellent schools and premium entertainment makes this property ideal for those seeking both sophistication and convenience.

perfect for peaceful retirement moments by the seaside
